title: Insomnia eSports (OOL team) LF Support Diamond+ Pref
body:
Hi there,

Insomnia eSports is looking for a dedicated support player. We are trialling quite a few people and looking for someone who stands out and adapts to the team nicely.

Platinum applicants will be considered, however diamond is preferred, as are players who have been diamond previous and intend on climbing. 

What we have:
Structure
Schedule
Strong Team
Good Comms
Friendly Environment

What we want:
Dedicated Player
Be able to make scrims (within reason)
Must be able to make tournaments (unless unforeseen events)
Be able to make flex (we like to practice in flex 5 mans)

We will be trialling all applicants and giving you all a fair shot :smiley: Look forward to playing with you all! To apply or for any more information contact Ninja POLO Shirt or Syn, and we will get back to you asap.

replies.body: I may know a guy, Add  Ix Sonic x. solid player
